item.description:
Ok, a change last minute. Plan B. Cheryl and I along with Glen and Kathy Rienhart are heading to Plymouth for breakfast. Maybe a city tour on the way home. Why not? All are welcome to fly down and join us. Find a plane and find a seat! Last minute, but, we're blasting off at 8:30 am..

In case you've been missing one of the best places to have breakfast, how about a short hop to Plymouth for eggs!

Either way, seeing as our Christmas party is the same night, lets go for the sake of flying in good wx. Otherwise might be a while..

RSVP and lets go!

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Eggs Benedict Breakfast at Plymouth?
